name: Shopping Cart Demo
body:
### Shopping Cart Demo 
A simple shopping cart demo using [Backbone.js](http://backbonejs.org/) and [jQuery-UI](http://jqueryui.com/). The idea is to have basic shopping cart behaviors such as:

* selecting products based on some categories, 
* drag and drop it to the basket
* removing selected item from basket 
* reset basket
* display total price 
  
Live demo can be found in http://www.spicevanjava.nl/shoppingCartDemo

### GitHub Link
https://github.com/rnugraha/ShoppingCartDemo.git 

### Source and Libraries 
Shopping Cart Demo makes use of following libraries

jQuery (jquery-1.6.2.min.js)  
http://jquery.com/

jquery.tmpl (jquery.tmpl.js)  
http://github.com/jquery/jquery-tmpl

jquery-ui (jquery-ui-1.9.2.js)  
http://jqueryui.com/

backbone.js  
http://backbonejs.org/  

### Authors and Contributors
Riza Nugraha  
rnugraha@gmail.com  
http://www.spicevanjava.nl
